message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.DS 

The paper deals with the problem of designing consistent learning algorithms for non-decomposable performance metrics, which is a fundamental problem in machine learning. The paper proposes a unified framework for analyzing multi-class non-decomposable performance metrics and provides a consistent learning algorithm for concave multi-class performance metrics. The paper also uses a novel technique based on the convergence analysis of the CG method. Given these factors, the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories for this paper are cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition), cs.CL (Computation and Language), and cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms).
